text: Valerio Zanone (22 January 1936 - 7 January 2016) was an Italian politician. He was secretary and president of the Italian Liberal Party. He was also a senator of the Democratic Party. He was mayor of Turin from 30 July 1990 until 31 December 1991. He was born in Turin, Piedmont. Zanone died on 7 January 2016 in Rome, aged 79. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Turin
title: Valerio Zanone
